```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import os
```

```{python}
os.chdir('../')
print(os.getcwd())

aqi_ozone = pd.read_csv("Project Data/Combined/aqi_ozone_all_years.csv")
```

```{python}
aqi_ozone["Date"] = pd.to_datetime(aqi_ozone["Date"])
aqi_ozone["Month"] = aqi_ozone["Date"].dt.month

aqi_ozone.head()
```

```{python}
aqi_ozone["Date"].dt.month.value_counts()
```

```{python}
aqi_ozone[["State"]].value_counts()
```

```{python}
aqi_ozone.boxplot(column = "AQI", by = "Month")

plt.show()
plt.close()
```

## Ozone AQI by Ozone

One plot for max one for mean, one for min.

```{python}
plt.scatter(x = aqi_ozone["max_ozone"], y = aqi_ozone["AQI"], c = "Black")
plt.xlabel("Max Daily Ozone")
plt.ylabel("Ozone AQI")

plt.show()
plt.close()

plt.scatter(x = aqi_ozone["mean_ozone"], y = aqi_ozone["AQI"], c = "Black")
plt.xlabel("Mean Daily Ozone")
plt.ylabel("Ozone AQI")

plt.show()
plt.close()

plt.scatter(x = aqi_ozone["min_ozone"], y = aqi_ozone["AQI"], c = "Black")
plt.xlabel("Minimum Daily Ozone")
plt.ylabel("Ozone AQI")

plt.show()
plt.close()


```

## Max vs mean ozone

```{python}
plt.scatter(x = aqi_ozone["max_ozone"], y = aqi_ozone["mean_ozone"], c = "Black")
plt.xlabel("Max Daily Ozone")
plt.ylabel("Mean Daily Ozone")

plt.show()
plt.close()
```

```{python}
aqi_ozone["mean_humid"].plot.hist(color = "Gray")
plt.xlabel("Mean Daily Humidity")

plt.show()
plt.close()
```
